title: "Love on the line" very condensed serif face
content:
I canâ€™t find a similar font, if someone can identify will be much appreciated. thanx

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103062710im_/http:/typophile.com/files/x_4208.jpg)
author: rockberto

comments.content:
I think there is something about the serifs that is a result of wear and not part of the font. Finding squarish narrow serif fonts with a serif on the middle arm of the E was not too easy, but maybe [Pall Mall](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103062710/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/pall-mall-rr/) Bold would work. You could use some sort of blurring effect and/or added stroke to further simulate the sample.

- Mike Yanega
